empty.description: Save your favorite topics and handbooks to access them quickly later. Start exploring and bookmark content that interests you.

progress.subtitle: Track your learning journey and achievements

handbookCompleted.title: Handbook Completed
handbookCompleted.description: You've completed all topics in the handbook!

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: We couldn't find anything matching "{{query}}". Try different keywords or browse our categories.

startTyping.title: Start typing to search
startTyping.description: Start typing to search for topics, categories, or content.

completionDialog.signInRequired: Please sign in to mark topics as complete
completionDialog.failedToUpdate: Failed to update. Please try again.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay updated with your learning activity

empty.title: No notifications
empty.description: You'll see notifications about your learning progress, new content, and updates here.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences

empty.description: Please sign in to view and manage your profile. Create an account to save your progress, bookmark topics, and personalize your learning experience.

placeholders.bio: Tell us a bit about yourself (optional)

labels.avatarDescription: Upload an image, choose from predefined avatars, or enter a URL. Leave empty to use initials.

newsletter.title: Weekly AI Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get weekly updates about AI trends and insights

handbookAlerts.description: Notify me when new handbooks are published

productUpdates.title: Product Updates
productUpdates.description: Stay informed about new features and improvements

changeEmail.title: Change Email Address
changeEmail.enterNew: Please enter a new email address
changeEmail.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
changeEmail.mustBeDifferent: New email must be different from current email
changeEmail.changeFailed: Failed to change email. Please try again.
changeEmail.changeRequestSent: Email change request sent. Please check your new email for confirmation.
changeEmail.currentEmailNote: Current email: {{email}}. You'll receive a confirmation email at the new address.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.fillAll: Please fill in all password fields
changePassword.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
changePassword.changeFailed: Failed to change password. Please try again.
changePassword.changeSuccess: Password changed successfully. You will be signed out for security.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
delete.modalDescription: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data including:
delete.typeDelete: Type DELETE to confirm:
delete.failed: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support.

validation.fullNameMaxLength: Full name must be less than 100 characters
validation.bioMaxLength: Bio must be less than 200 characters

errors.fixErrors: Please fix the errors in the form before saving your changes.

topics.title: No topics in {{category}}
topics.description: This category doesn't have any topics yet. Check back later or explore other categories.

categories.title: No categories available
categories.description: Categories will appear here once they're added to the platform.

weeklyReport.title: AI Weekly
weeklyReport.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest AI research, industry news, and technological developments. Each report provides a curated summary of key events, breakthroughs, and trends to keep you at the forefront of the field.

empty.title: No AI Weekly Available
empty.description: Check back soon for the latest research highlights and developments.

errors.loadFailedDescription: Unable to load weekly reports. Please try again.
